sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AjaxRoadmapUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Ajax utility to draw Timeline Visualization as dashboard using another server side script include "RoadmapUtil"</description>
        <name>AjaxRoadmapUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AjaxRoadmapUtil = Class.create();
AjaxRoadmapUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    getRoadmapLanes: function() {
        var keyName = this.getParameter('sysparm_key_name');
        var keyValue = this.getParameter('sysparm_key_value');
        var roadmapUtil = new RoadmapUtil();
        var lanes = roadmapUtil.getRoadmapLanes(keyName, keyValue);
        return lanes;
    },

    getRoadmapItems: function() {
        var keyName = this.getParameter('sysparm_key_name');
        var keyValue = this.getParameter('sysparm_key_value');
        var itemQuery = this.getParameter('sysparm_item_query');
        var fetchDate = this.getParameter('sysparm_key_start_date');
        var laneIds = this.getParameter('sysparm_key_laneids');
        var forward = this.getParameter('sysparm_key_forward');
        var roadmapUtil = new RoadmapUtil();
        var items = roadmapUtil.getRoadmapItems(keyName, keyValue, itemQuery, fetchDate, laneIds, forward);
        return items;
    },

    getChoices: function() {
        var table = this.getParameter('sysparm_table');
        var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            var field = this.getParameter('sysparm_field');
            var roadmapUtil = new RoadmapUtil();
            var choices = roadmapUtil.getChoices(table, field);
            return choices;
        } else {
            MobileMessageUtil.addSecurityErrorForTable(table);
            return;
        }

    },

    getChoiceFieldNames: function() {
        var table = this.getParameter('sysparm_table');
        var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            var roadmapUtil = new RoadmapUtil();
            var choices = roadmapUtil.getChoiceFieldNames(table);
            return choices;
        } else {
            MobileMessageUtil.addSecurityErrorForTable(table);
            return;
        }

    },

    getRoadmapForTable: function() {
        var table = this.getParameter('sysparm_table');
        var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            var roadmapUtil = new RoadmapUtil();
            var sysId = roadmapUtil.getRoadmapForTable(table);
            return sysId;
        } else {
            MobileMessageUtil.addSecurityErrorForTable(table);
            return;
        }

    },

    type: 'AjaxRoadmapUtil'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2013-11-04 22:50:41</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2a0bde52bf30110058c9beba3f0739ef</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>31</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AjaxRoadmapUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Timeline Visualization" source="com.snc.timeline_visualization">e7ff8ee747e64210cd4e1ce4316d438c</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2a0bde52bf30110058c9beba3f0739ef</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-05-09 06:45:42</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
